attributes.action: to tell the BBC that they cannot make channels for US viewers such as BBC USA and if so then scrap the license fee at once.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we British have to pay for a tv channel shown in the USA which is the richest country in the world and funded by license fee payers back in the UK.... Why? Does the BBC really think that we are that important, the BBC is for the UK, world service helps British citizens worldwide, however this channel apparently is in competition with US channels, why do we need to give the US something paid for by all the poor folk in the UK?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
